minions.name: Apricot
minions.description: Talent: Destroy another player's minion of power 2 or less here

minions.name: Eliza
minions.description: Ongoing: Other players cannot play more than one extra card per turn

minions.name: Grizelda
minions.description: Talent: Place an Heirloom card from your discard pile into your hand

minions.name: Marie DeGraw
minions.description: Talent: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a minion, draw it. Otherwise, place it on the bottom of your deck

minions.name: Sleeping Beauty
minions.description: Ongoing: If this minion would go to the discard pile, shuffle it into your deck instead

minions.name: Snow White
minions.description: Talent: Move a minion from another base to here

actions.name: Heirloom
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This card gives this minion +1 power for each Heirloom on it. This card cannot be destroyed

actions.name: Direct to DVD Sequel
actions.description: Shuffle a minion from your discard pile into your deck and draw a card

actions.name: Skillet
actions.description: Destroy a minion of power 2 or less and draw a card

actions.name: True Love's Kiss
actions.description: Move a minion to another base

actions.name: Fairy Godmother
actions.description: Draw a card, OR one minion gets +2 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Happily Ever After
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you are the winner here when this base scores, gain 1 VP

actions.name: Some Day My Prince Will Come
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, move a minion from there to another base

actions.name: Tale as Old as Time
actions.description: Choose a base. Move all of your minions to it

actions.name: Woodland Helpers
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: After you play an action, you may place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile
